39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that about:Kal Muhl, the Prophet (s.a.w) said: "Like boiling oil, such that whenever it is brought near him the skin of his face falls into it." And also with this chain, from the is Prophet SAW, that he said: "If a bucket of Ghassaq were poured out in the world, the people of the world would rot. (Da'if) And the meaning of his statement: "The Kithaf of each wall" is its thickness

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صِفَةِ شَرَابِ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About the Description of the Drink of the Inhabitants of the Fire
